title: npm install react fails w/ "invalid name"
body:
Trying to `npm install react` to use with Browserify,  but I'm getting an error:

`Invalid name: "learn react"`

I've got react-tools installed globally already. Is this a problem with the package, or can I do something different on my end?

npm-debug.log:

```
0 info it worked if it ends with ok
1 verbose cli [ '/usr/local/bin/iojs',
1 verbose cli   '/usr/local/bin/npm',
1 verbose cli   'install',
1 verbose cli   'react' ]
2 info using npm@2.11.0
3 info using node@v1.6.2
4 verbose install initial load of /Users/ajfarkas/Sites/Learning/react/package.json
5 verbose stack Error: Invalid name: "learn react"
5 verbose stack     at ensureValidName (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/normalize-package-data/lib/fixer.js:326:15)
5 verbose stack     at Object.module.exports.fixNameField (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/normalize-package-data/lib/fixer.js:209:5)
5 verbose stack     at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/normalize-package-data/lib/normalize.js:32:38
5 verbose stack     at Array.forEach (native)
5 verbose stack     at normalize (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/normalize-package-data/lib/normalize.js:31:15)
5 verbose stack     at final (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/read-package-json/read-json.js:338:5)
5 verbose stack     at then (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/read-package-json/read-json.js:113:5)
5 verbose stack     at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/read-package-json/read-json.js:284:20
5 verbose stack     at FSReqWrap.readFileAfterOpen [as oncomplete] (evalmachine.<anonymous>:302:5)
6 verbose cwd /Users/ajfarkas/Sites/Learning/react
7 error Darwin 13.4.0
8 error argv "/usr/local/bin/iojs" "/usr/local/bin/npm" "install" "react"
9 error node v1.6.2
10 error npm  v2.11.0
11 error Invalid name: "learn react"
12 error If you need help, you may report this error at:
12 error     <https://github.com/npm/npm/issues>
13 verbose exit [ 1, true ]
```
